channel.title: Health on Ru-Lai's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Ru-Lai's Blog

item.title: Learning on the job
item.description: The learner's work desk One of the most rewarding (and challenging) things you can do as a developer is to implement something you’ve never done before. It’s even harder to is implement something you have never done before while on a deadline. The pressure of needing to get work done in a specific time frame can add more stress to the already difficult challenge of finding an optimal solution to a new problem.

item.title: How Spaced Review Changed My Life
item.description: The Beginning I didn’t start out in this world happy. When I was young I felt different from most people. I would check out mentally at school, not want to play with friends, and spend a lot of my time watching TV and wishing I was someone else. Most of my distress early on resulted from my mother’s passing away when I was four-and-a-half. Two years later more was added on when my father chose to remarry a physically and emotionally abusive woman.
